instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates physical model drum synthesis
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; dripwater opcode: ares dripwater kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq] [, ifreq1] [, ifreq2]
    ; dripwater simulates water drops
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; idettack - time to attack peak
    ; inum - number of drops
    ; idamp - damping
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 10
    iDamp = 0.1
    iFreq = 450
    iFreq1 = 600
    iFreq2 = 750
    
    aDrip dripwater kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, 0, iFreq, iFreq1, iFreq2
    
    outs aDrip, aDrip
endin

instr 2
    ; tambourine opcode: ares tambourine kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq] [, ifreq1] [, ifreq2]
    ; tambourine simulates tambourine
    ; Similar parameters to dripwater
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 32
    iDamp = 0.05
    iMaxShake = 0
    iFreq = 2300
    
    aTamb tambourine kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake, iFreq
    
    outs aTamb, aTamb
endin

instr 3
    ; sleighbells opcode: ares sleighbells kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq] [, ifreq1] [, ifreq2]
    ; sleighbells simulates sleigh bells
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 32
    iDamp = 0.03
    iMaxShake = 0
    iFreq = 2500
    
    aBells sleighbells kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake, iFreq
    
    outs aBells, aBells
endin

instr 4
    ; guiro opcode: ares guiro kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq] [, ifreq1] [, ifreq2]
    ; guiro simulates scraped gourd
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 128
    iDamp = 0.1
    iMaxShake = 0
    iFreq = 2500
    
    aGuiro guiro kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake, iFreq
    
    outs aGuiro, aGuiro
endin

instr 5
    ; cabasa opcode: ares cabasa kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]
    ; cabasa simulates cabasa shaker
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 512
    iDamp = 0.1
    iMaxShake = 0
    
    aCabasa cabasa kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake
    
    outs aCabasa, aCabasa
endin

instr 6
    ; sekere opcode: ares sekere kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]
    ; sekere simulates beaded gourd
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 64
    iDamp = 0.1
    iMaxShake = 0
    
    aSekere sekere kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake
    
    outs aSekere, aSekere
endin

instr 7
    ; sandpaper opcode: ares sandpaper kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]
    ; sandpaper simulates sandpaper scraping
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 128
    iDamp = 0.1
    iMaxShake = 0
    
    aSand sandpaper kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake
    
    outs aSand, aSand
endin

instr 8
    ; crunch opcode: ares crunch kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]
    ; crunch simulates crunching sounds
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    iDetTack = 0.01
    iNum = 7
    iDamp = 0.1
    iMaxShake = 0
    
    aCrunch crunch kAmp, iDetTack, iNum, iDamp, iMaxShake
    
    outs aCrunch, aCrunch
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

; Play water drops
i1 0 2
i1 2.5 2

; Play tambourine
i2 5.5 1
i2 6.5 1

; Play sleigh bells
i3 8.5 2

; Play guiro
i4 11.5 1
i4 12.5 1

; Play cabasa
i5 14.5 1
i5 15.5 1

; Play sekere
i6 17.5 1
i6 18.5 1

; Play sandpaper
i7 20.5 1
i7 21.5 1

; Play crunch
i8 23.5 1
i8 24.5 1

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>
